description:
Coastline for the BCLME (Benguela Current Large Marine Ecosystem) region.
Source for Angola: Digitised from GeoCover orthorectified Landsat ETM mosaics (2000) - zulu.ssc.nasa.gov, except for are between Sacomar and Porto Alexandre (from 1:100K topo maps), last 4 km south before border with Nam (from orthophotos of Namibia) and for Bengo Bay (from Google image)- digitizing done by  GreenMap Consultants CC.
Source for Namibia: Orthophotos taken from 25 Feb 2001 to 1 March 2002 by Airborne Laser Solutions for Ministry of Lands & Resettlement (MLR) ; Baseline points for Namibian coastline (MLR), Digitising : GreenMap, checking for completeness of islands with 1:50,000 topo maps.
Method: Digitised from colour orthophotos Surveyor General, accompanied by base line points - digitizing done by  GreenMap Consultants CC.
Source for South Africa:1:50,000 topographic maps of Directorate of Surveys and Land information, South Africa.
Method: 1:50,000 data for the different 1:50,000 map sheets were merged in ArcView 3.2a by T.Wolf.
name: BCLME: Coastline
